title: Kookoo Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery, Catering, European, Fusion, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. Cozy, artsy cafe with Iranian influence serving espresso drinks (with soy and almond milk); homemade pastries; vegan soups; vegan and vegetarian plates, sandwiches, and salads (with GF bread options); breakfast all day, and more. Some examples from the menu include falafel plates and wraps, hummus wraps, taboulleh sandwiches, roasted eggplant sandwich with garlic, avocado sandwiches, stuffed grape-leaves, made-in-house oatmeal, soups (tomato, butternut squash, lentil, black bean), banana smoothies, and more. Located conveniently across from the Brookline Village T-stop.
The only meat they serve is tuna. Staff is happy to accommodate any dietary preferences and most menu items can be made vegan upon request.
